item.title: Build Your Visual Studio Code Development Environment Using PowerShell DSC
item.description: I keep re-building my lab machines and in the process I rebuild my development virtual machines. One of the items that gets reinstalled all the time is Visual Studio Code editor.

item.title: How to add a new functionality to the Visual Studio Code PowerShell extension
item.description: Visual Studio Code is a free code editor redefined and optimized for building and debugging modern web and cloud applications.

item.title: PowerShell Extension for #VisualStudio Code #Connect2015
item.description: If you are not watching #VisualStudio #Connect2015, you are certainly missing a lot. Because â€¦ @ScottGu just announced a lot of new features including extension support in Visual Studio Code.
